alert.note: Alert for Butte; Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 23 at 1:38PM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to around 55 mph possible. The strongest winds are expected from Belle Fourche to Box Elder to Folsom. * WHERE...Butte County, the Custer County Plains, the Pennington County Plains and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
